text: The 1951–52 FAW Welsh Cup is the 65th season of the annual knockout tournament for competitive football teams in Wales. ==Key== League name pointed after clubs name. *CCL - Cheshire County League *FL D3N - Football League Third Division North *SFL - Southern Football League ==Fifth round== Ten winners from the Fourth round and six new clubs. {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center" |- !width=50|Tie no !width=250|Home !width=50|Score !width=250|Away |- |1||Chester (FL D3N)||3–1||Bangor City (CCL) |} ==Sixth round== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !width=50|Tie no !width=250|Home !width=50|Score !width=250|Away |- |1||Wrexham (FL D3N)||0–0||Chester (FL D3N) |- |replay||Wrexham (FL D3N)||2–0 ||Chester (FL D3N) |} ==Semifinal== Cardiff City and Wrexham played at Shrewsbury, both matches between. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !width=50|Tie no !width=250|Home !width=50|Score !width=250|Away |- |1||Barry Town (SFL)||1–1||Rhyl (CCL) |- |replay||Barry Town (SFL)||0–1 ||Rhyl (CCL) |- |2||Wrexham (FL D3N)||0–0||Merthyr Tydfil (SFL) |} ==Final== Final were held at Cardiff. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !width=50|Tie no !width=250|Home !width=50|Score !width=250|Away |- |1||Rhyl (CCL)||4–3||Merthyr Tydfil (SFL) |} ==External links== *The FAW Welsh Cup 1951-52 Wales Cup
title: 1951–52 Welsh Cup
